The Charming Foxhole Recipe
Close

Serves

Cook Mode

Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
reposado tequila
1/2
ounce
Aperol
1/4
ounce
Amaro Nonino
1/2
ounce
Cocchi Vermouth di Torino
2
dashes
Peychaud's bitters
Garnish:
grapefruit twist
Directions
Add tequila, Aperol, Nonino, Cocchi Vermouth di Torino, and Peychaud's to a mixing glass. Fill 2/3 full with ice and stir until well chilled, about 20 seconds.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with a large grapefruit twist, and serve.
Special equipment
Mixing Glass, Barspoon, Strainer, Cocktail Glass, Citrus Peeler
